  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (!window.console) { window.console = {};  window.console.log = function () {};}
// Hack for bad google ad
var adTimer = window.setInterval(resizeGoogleAd, 1000);
window.timesChecked = 0;
function resizeGoogleAd(){
	var adDiv = document.getElementById('creative_57777181_0');
	if(typeof adDiv !== 'undefined' &amp;&amp; adDiv !== null){
		adDiv.style.width = '';
		adDiv.style.height = '';
		var adDivChild = adDiv.firstChild;
		adDivChild.style.width = '';
		adDivChild.style.height = '';
		var nextChild = adDivChild.firstChild;
		nextChild.style.position = '';
		window.clearInterval(adTimer);
		return;
	}
	if(timesChecked &gt;= 4){
		window.clearInterval(adTimer);
		return;
	}
}
  </script>

   var CS_segments = ''; 
CS_segments = __ZDDMP.GetAdString() +function () { 
    var key='special';
    var sp=decodeURIComponent((new RegExp('[?|&amp;]' + key + '=' + '([^&amp;;]+?)(&amp;|#|;|$)').exec(location.search)||[,""])[1].replace(/\+/g, '%20'))||null;
    return (sp==null?'':';'+key+'='+sp);
}();
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   var __GEEK = __GEEK || {};
    __GEEK.parseQuerystring = __GEEK.parseQuerystring || function (url) {
	   var q = {};
	   if (!url) {
		 return {};
	   }
	    url.replace(/([^?=&amp;]+)(=([^&amp;]*))?/g, function ($0, $1, $2, $3) { q[$1] = $3; });
	    return q;
  };
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">

	__GEEK.detectOOFChange();
     })();
     var querystring = __GEEK.parseQuerystring(window.location.href);
     var extraKeys =  (window["CS_segments"] ? CS_segments : '') + (window["extraAdValues"] ? ';' + extraAdValues : '') + "";

	__GEEK.OOF = __GEEK.detectOOF();
     }
     googletag.cmd.push(function() {
	     	
	   var adSlot = googletag.defineSlot('/4585/zd.geek/newssection_ATF',[[970,250], [728,90]], 'TopBanner');

			    adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
			}
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {

		   }

	   __GEEK.currentAds.push({

			    var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			    adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
			}
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   }
		   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
	   __GEEK.currentAds.push({ 
	    divId: 'TopMpu', 
	    slot: adSlot, 
			adSize: [[300,250], [300,600],[300,1050]],
			adUnit:'/4585/zd.geek/newssection_ATF',
			adZdid:'1454845'
	    });
		
	   var adSlot = googletag.defineSlot('/4585/zd.geek/newssection_BTF',[[300,250], [300,600],[300,1050]], 'BottomMpu');
		   adSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		   adSlot.setTargeting("zdid", "1454845" );
		   adSlot.setTargeting("cmn","zd");
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);
		   adSlot.setTargeting("template", "article" );
		   for(var i = 0; i &lt; extraKeysArray.length; i++) {
			if (extraKeysArray[i].length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; extraKeysArray[i].indexOf("=") &gt; -1) {
			    var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			    adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
			}
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   }
		   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
	   __GEEK.currentAds.push({ 
	    divId: 'BottomMpu', 
	    slot: adSlot, 
			adSize: [[300,250], [300,600],[300,1050]],
			adUnit:'/4585/zd.geek/newssection_BTF',
			adZdid:'1454845'
	    });
			   var adSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot('/4585/zd.geek/newssection', 'StitialAds');
		   adSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		   adSlot.setTargeting("zdid", "1454845" );
		   adSlot.setTargeting("cmn","zd");
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);		   
		   adSlot.setTargeting("template", "article" );
		   for(var i = 0; i &lt; extraKeysArray.length; i++) {
		    if (extraKeysArray[i].length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; extraKeysArray[i].indexOf("=") &gt; -1) {
			var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
		    }
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   } 
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOP_type", 'stitials');
		   if(querystring.special){
		adSlot.setTargeting("special", querystring.special);
	   }
	   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
				   var adSlot = googletag.defineOutOfPageSlot('/4585/zd.geek/newssection', 'SpecialAds');
		   adSlot.addService(googletag.pubads());
		   adSlot.setTargeting("zdid", "1454845" );
		   adSlot.setTargeting("cmn","zd");
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOF", __GEEK.OOF);		   
		   adSlot.setTargeting("template", "article" );
		   for(var i = 0; i &lt; extraKeysArray.length; i++) {
		    if (extraKeysArray[i].length &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; extraKeysArray[i].indexOf("=") &gt; -1) {
			var extraItem = extraKeysArray[i].split("=");
			adSlot.setTargeting(extraItem[0], extraItem[1]);
		    }
		   }
		   if (typeof __ZDDMP !== "undefined" &amp;&amp; __ZDDMP.NewCorrelator) {
		      adSlot.setTargeting("zc",__ZDDMP.NewCorrelator());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("p",__ZDDMP.GetPSegs());
		      adSlot.setTargeting("s",__ZDDMP.GetUSegs());
		   } 
		   adSlot.setTargeting("OOP_type", 'skin');
		   if(querystring.special){
		adSlot.setTargeting("special", querystring.special);
	   }
	   adSlot.setCollapseEmptyDiv(true);
				   googletag.enableServices();
		});
	var _gaq = _gaq || [];
	_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 2 , 'template', 'article', 3 ]);
	_gaq.push(['_setCustomVar', 3 , 'OOF', __GEEK.OOF, 3 ]);
	_gaq.push(["_trackPageview"]);
  </script>

   window.ZDVOptions = {
  onViewed: function(ad) {
  if (ad.containerId === "TopBanner") {
      if ((ad.size === "728x90" || ad.size === "970x250") ){
         __GEEKSTICKY.Unsticky();
         console.log("banner ad is released");
      }
    }
   if (ad.containerId === "TopMpu") {
      if ((ad.size === "300x250" || ad.size === "300x600") ){

         <aside class="widget widget_more_posts_by_category" id="more_posts_by_category-2">
          <h3 class="widget-title">
           More Geek
          </h3>
          <div class="moreongeek">
           <article>
            <figure>

             <img src="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ad?iu=/4585/zd.geek/newssection&amp;t=zdid%3D1454845%26cmn%3Dzd&amp;sz=x&amp;template=article&amp;c=2134849&amp;tile=4"/>

             <img src="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ad?iu=/4585/zd.geek/newssection&amp;t=zdid%3D1454845%26cmn%3Dzd&amp;sz=x&amp;template=article&amp;c=3025588&amp;tile=5"/>

         <div id="adcontainer2">
         </div>
        </div>
        <!-- Bottom Sidebar -->
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="rightpanel">
       <div class="articleinfo">
        <div class="category">
         <span class="red">
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/category/news/">
           News
          </a>
         </span>
         <span>
          By
          <span class="by">
           <a href="http://www.geek.com/author/rayw/" rel="author" title="Posts by Ray Walters">
            Ray Walters
           </a>
          </span>
          Jan. 4, 2012 7:03 pm
         </span>
        </div>
        <figure>
         <img alt="Cooling Tower Swing" class="attachment-post-thumbnail wp-post-image" height="421" src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/01/st_reactorpark_1-590x421.jpeg" width="590"/>
        </figure>
        <article>
         <p>
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/geek-cetera/german-nuclear-reactor-repurposed-into-a-theme-park-2012014/st_reactorpark_1/" rel="attachment wp-att-1454849">
          </a>
         </p>
         <p>
          If you are starting to make plans for this years summer vacation, you may want to add Dusseldorf, Germany to your list of possible destinations. Where else in the world can you take your family to a theme park built into the remains of a nuclear reactor?
         </p>
         <p>
          Before you start shopping for a
          <a href="http://www.geek.com/articles/gadgets/be-ready-very-own-geiger-counter-20111014/" title="Be ready for anything with this $99 Geiger counter">
           personal geiger counter
          </a>
          , the theme park named Wunderland Kalkar was built inside a facility that has never been put into operation. Originally called SNR-300, construction delays and resident protests forced a cessation of efforts to bring the plant online. The site sat dormant until Hennie van der Most, a Dutch entrepreneur, purchased it with the idea of making it into an amusement park for families.
         </p>
         <p>
          Right now Wunderland Kalkar has 40 outdoor attractions including a swing ride that puts thrill seekers over the top of the facilities cooling tower. Guests can also enjoy eating at one of the parks four restaurants or getting some liquid courage from the seven different themed pubs available. There is even a hotel for people wanting to stay overnight to make sure they hit all the rides. Included with the price of admission are all you-can-eat french fries, soft drinks and ice cream. Sounds like a pretty good deal!
         </p>
         <p>
          <iframe allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="369" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/kLIzZLhzYrQ?rel=0?wmode=transparent" width="500">
          </iframe>
         </p>
         <p>
          Currently van der Most is again showing his ingenuity by constructing an indoor theme park designed for use during the cold winter months. This indoor amusement area is being built right into the unused reactor building, which can be seen as either creepy or smart depending on the way you look at it. Looking at
          <a href="http://www.wunderlandkalkar.eu/en">
           Wunderlands website
          </a>
          , the video shown makes it look like any other amusement park we have seen, and a good one at that. It must have something going for it as the park boasts an attendance of over 600,000 guests a year.
         </p>
         <p>
          Read more at
          <a href="http://www.wired.com/magazine/2011/12/st_reactorpark/?utm_source=twitterfeed&amp;utm_medium=twitter&amp;utm_campaign=nettechnews&amp;pid=7952">
           Wired
          </a>
         </p>
         <div class="pagenationsearch">
          <p>
          </p>
         </div>
        </article>
        <aside class="widget widget_execphp" id="execphp-32">

         </script>

         </script>

           All currently supported events:
            * preData  fires just before we request for initial data
            * preInit - fires after we get initial data but before we load any dependencies
            * onInit  - fires when all dependencies are resolved but before dtpl template is rendered
            * afterRender - fires when template is rendered but before we show it
            * onReady - everything is done
         */

        config.callbacks.preData.push(function() {
            // clear out the container (its filled for SEO/legacy purposes)
            document.getElementById(disqus_container_id).innerHTML = '';
        });

   <!--Plugin WP Missed Schedule 2013.1231.2013 Active - Tag 6707293c0218e2d8b7aa38d418ffa608-->
   <!-- This website is patched against a big problem not solved from WordPress 2.5+ to date -->
   <script type="text/javascript">
    // &lt;![CDATA[
        var disqus_shortname = 'geekcom';
        (function () {
            var nodes = document.getElementsByTagName('span');
            for (var i = 0, url; i &lt; nodes.length; i++) {
                if (nodes[i].className.indexOf('dsq-postid') != -1) {
                    nodes[i].parentNode.setAttribute('data-disqus-identifier', nodes[i].getAttribute('rel'));
                    url = nodes[i].parentNode.href.split('#', 1);
                    if (url.length == 1) url = url[0];
                    else url = url[1]
                    nodes[i].parentNode.href = url + '#disqus_thread';
                }
            }
            var s = document.createElement('script'); s.async = true;
            s.type = 'text/javascript';
            s.src = '//' + 'disqus.com/forums/' + disqus_shortname + '/count.js';
            (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
        }());
    //]]&gt;
   </script>
   <script src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/themes/geek7/js/jquery.infinitescroll.min.js?ver=1363972242" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/themes/geek7/js/jquery.fancybox.pack.js?ver=1363972242" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/themes/geek7/js/jquery.tn3.min.js?ver=1363972242" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/themes/geek7/js/tn3.history.js?ver=1363972242" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="http://www.geek.com/wp-content/themes/geek7/js/tn3.touch.js?ver=1363972242" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <!-- Tab Stuff -->
   <script type="text/javascript">
    window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
    _taboola.push({flush: true});
    
    var __ZDTABEVENT = {
        accountid : "",
        init : function(acct) {
            __ZDTABEVENT.accountid = acct;
            var divs = document.querySelectorAll("div[id^=taboola]"), i=divs.length;
            while (i--) {
                divs[i].addEventListener("click", __ZDTABEVENT.clkevt);
                __ZDTABEVENT.track(divs[i].id, "imp");
            }
        },
        clkevt : function(evt){
            __ZDTABEVENT.track(evt.currentTarget.id, "clk");


        },
        track : function(id,evt) {
            var el = document.getElementById(id);
            var placement = el.getAttribute('data-placement');
            var pagetype = el.getAttribute('data-page-type');
            if(window.ga) window.ga('send', 'event', 'Taboola', pagetype + '-' + placement, evt);
            if(window._gaq) window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Taboola', pagetype+'-'+placement, evt, undefined, true]);
            if (__ZDDMP) { __ZDDMP.Event({signal:'taboola', pubid: __ZDTABEVENT.accountid, ptype:pagetype, placement:placement, evt:evt});}
        }
    };
    __ZDTABEVENT.init('ziffdavis-network15-geek');
   </script>
   <!-- begin zdbb -->
   <script src="http://cdn.static.zdbb.net/js/z0WVjCBSEeGLoxIxOQVEwQ.min.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <noscript>
    <img alt="" height="1" src="http://zdbb.net/l/z0WVjCBSEeGLoxIxOQVEwQ/" width="1"/>
   </noscript>
   <!-- end zdbb -->

    el_nstrack.parentNode.insertBefore(nstrack, el_nstrack);
  })();

(function(){
function loadChartbeat()
{ window._sf_endpt=(new Date()).getTime(); var e = document.createElement('script'); e.setAttribute('language', 'javascript'); e.setAttribute('type', 'text/javascript'); e.setAttribute('src', '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js'); document.body.appendChild(e); }

var oldonload = window.onload;
window.onload = (typeof window.onload != 'function') ?
loadChartbeat : function()
{ oldonload(); loadChartbeat(); }

;
})();
   </script>

    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
  setTimeout(function() {
  if (jQuery("#adsense").height() &lt; 8) { 
    if (window._gaq) { window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'AdBlocker','Blocked' ,undefined, undefined, true]); }
    if (window.ga) { window.ga('send', 'event', 'AdBlocker', 'Blocked'); }
  } else {
    if (window._gaq) { window._gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'AdBlocker','NotBlocked' ,undefined, undefined, true]); }
    if (window.ga) { window.ga('send', 'event', 'AdBlocker', 'NotBlocked' ); }
    }
	}, 2000);
});
